createnamespace.name: CreateNamespace
createnamespace.description: Grants permission to create a namespace

deletenamespace.description: Grants permission to delete a namespace

deletetablebucket.description: Grants permission to delete a table bucket

deletetablebucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a policy on a table bucket

deletetablebucketreplication.description: Grants permission to delete table bucket replication configuration on a bucket

deletetablepolicy.name: DeleteTablePolicy
deletetablepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a policy on a table

deletetablereplication.name: DeleteTableReplication
deletetablereplication.description: Grants permission to delete table replication configuration on a table

getnamespace.name: GetNamespace
getnamespace.description: Grants permission to get a namespace

gettable.name: GetTable
gettable.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table

gettablebucket.name: GetTableBucket
gettablebucket.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table bucket

gettablebucketreplication.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table bucket replication configuration on a bucket

gettablebucketstorageclass.name: GetTableBucketStorageClass
gettablebucketstorageclass.description: Grants permission to retrieve the storage class configuration for a table bucket

gettabledata.name: GetTableData
gettabledata.description: Grants permission to read metadata and data objects from a table storage endpoint using S3 APIs

gettableencryption.name: GetTableEncryption
gettableencryption.description: Grants permission to retrieve encryption configuration on a table

gettablemaintenanceconfiguration.name: GetTableMaintenanceConfiguration
gettablemaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve a maintenance configuration on a table

gettablemaintenancejobstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of maintenance jobs on a table

gettablepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a policy on a table

gettablerecordexpirationjobstatus.name: GetTableRecordExpirationJobStatus
gettablerecordexpirationjobstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of table record expiration jobs on a system table

gettablereplication.name: GetTableReplication
gettablereplication.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table replication configuration on a table

gettablereplicationstatus.name: GetTableReplicationStatus
gettablereplicationstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table replication status on a table

gettablestorageclass.name: GetTableStorageClass
gettablestorageclass.description: Grants permission to retrieve the storage class configuration for a specific table

listtablebuckets.name: ListTableBuckets
listtablebuckets.description: Grants permission to list table buckets

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an S3 Tables resource

puttablebucketencryption.description: Grants permission to put or overwrite encryption configuration on a table bucket

puttablebucketmaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put a maintenance configuration on a table bucket

puttablebucketreplication.description: Grants permission to put table bucket replication configuration on a bucket

puttablebucketstorageclass.name: PutTableBucketStorageClass
puttablebucketstorageclass.description: Grants permission to set or update the storage class configuration for a table bucket

puttabledata.name: PutTableData
puttabledata.description: Grants permission to write metadata and data objects to a table storage endpoint using S3 APIs

puttableencryption.name: PutTableEncryption
puttableencryption.description: Grants permission to put encryption configuration on a table

puttablemaintenanceconfiguration.name: PutTableMaintenanceConfiguration
puttablemaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put a maintenance configuration on a table

puttablepolicy.name: PutTablePolicy
puttablepolicy.description: Grants permission to create or overwrite a policy on a table

puttablerecordexpirationconfiguration.name: PutTableRecordExpirationConfiguration
puttablerecordexpirationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put a table record expiration configuration on a system table

puttablereplication.name: PutTableReplication
puttablereplication.description: Grants permission to put table replication configuration on a table

puttablestorageclass.name: PutTableStorageClass
puttablestorageclass.description: Grants permission to set or update the storage class configuration for a table
